cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Homeland Security on March 18, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 1877, Security Screening During COVID-19 Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 47 (Friday, March 12, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. CLEAVER:
H.R. 1877.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I of the Constitution
[Page H1364]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

title: Security Screening During COVID-19 Act
